description:
Refreshed and renewed, this beautiful bungalow known as 'Red Gum Cottage' boasts endless charm and timeless character in a peaceful parkside setting. In a dream location close to transport, shops and recreation space, residents will enjoy a sought-after lifestyle across 556sqm with the perfect north-east aspect at the rear.

Retaining all the original details of a traditional bungalow, the house exudes a warm and cosy ambience that will make you feel right at home. Newly renovated and revived into a gorgeous cottage, you will love the fresh interiors, grey and white tones, and the brand new garden, complete with a rainforest retreat and a herb and vegetable patch for home-grown produce.

* Lovely street appeal with a picket fence and turfed front and rear lawns
* New front path and reconfigured front steps
* Entry via the front verandah, a wonderful spot to relax and entertain guests
* Lounge and dining area flowing to the open plan kitchen
* Rear deck accessing the spacious backyard, perfect for kids and pets to enjoy
* Gardens landscaped with native plants, Lillipillies and a herb and veggie garden
* 3 bedrooms and a remodelled bathroom with a new toilet and vanity
* Master with a bay window and custom-made wardrobe
* Second bedroom with a wardrobe and custom blinds
* Traditional high ceilings, VJ walls, stained glass and casement windows inside
* New air-conditioning and custom fretwork keeping with the traditional style
* Fresh paint, inside and out, new lighting, and sanded and stained decks and timber floors
* Double garage with custom timber gates and covered access up the back stairs
* Under house storage, powder room and a new laundry
* Newly laid reinforced concrete sub-floor under house
* New driveway accessing the garage and double off-street parking
* Replaced guttering and downpipes; new retaining wall
* Proximity to childcare, St Ambrose, Marist, Mt St Michael's and Kelvin Grove State College

In a beautiful location, practically right on the park, families can walk to peaceful recreation areas and stroll to the bikeway, walking tracks and playgrounds at the end of the street. Wonderfully quiet, yet only 4km to the CBD, residents will love the lifestyle and convenience. You can walk to the Ashgrove and Newmarket shopping precincts, catch a bus to schools and the city, and access QUT in 5 minutes.

listers.name: Tamara Lee
listers.job_title: Licensed Real-Estate Agent - Sales and Marketing Specialist
